name: Pokemon Go
subtitle: Java Game built using design patterns
description: An interactive game in Java implemented on Greenfoot platform using standard design patterns - Factory, Observer, Composite, Decorator and Command. The player can move around in the Pokemon world and fight with wild Pokemons and duel with other trainers.

name: Java UML Parser
subtitle: Generate UML diagram for Java projects
description: A Java application that generates UML class diagram for provided Java source code path. The parser program reads all of the Java code in provided path of Java project and outputs its class diagram image generated using a drawing API, while adhering to standard UML notations.

name: Starbucks
subtitle: Coffee ordering app built using Design patterns
description: A mobile app mock-up in Java to add cards, activate, scan, and pay using design patterns â€“ Observer, Strategy, State, Composite, Decorator, Proxy, Singleton. Implemented backend APIs in Go Lang and a Cash register app in Node.js.

name: Marketplace
subtitle: A full-stack e-Commerce website
description: A full stack e-commerce market place that combines the products from four different online markets

name: Student Square
subtitle: Distributed student discussion forum
description: A Full-Stack student discussion forum where students can sign-up, set up profile, and network by starting discussions, posting questions, comments, vote... App was deployed with distributed architecutre on Google Kubernetes Engine. Improved performance with Load balancer and Redis cache manager.

name: Personal Website
subtitle: A creative portfolio website
description: Designed and built a creative personal portfolio website from scratch using react.js and Material UI.
